column2:
Window:
Just modify 1 line, and you can change it.
cwp.py
in 
C:\Users\ [your computer name]\Anaconda2
.
os.chdir(documents_folder)

Update:
When it comes to MacOS, I couldnt find the cwp.py.
Here is what I found:
Open terminal on your Macbook, run 'jupyter notebook --generate-config'.
It will create a config file at \Users\catbuilts\.jupyter\jupyter_notebook_config.
Open the config file, then change this line #c.NotebookApp.notebook_dir = '' (search for the word '_dir')
